DELIVERY_TIME.TOOLTIP: Delivery Time = Handling Time + Shipping Time. Holidays are not included. For example, the shipping time of DHL or UPS is usually 1-2 working days.

DURATION.TOOLTIP: Duration of the service or minimum bookable unit you provide.

BREAK.TOOLTIP: Break between each appointment. E.g. for appointment preparation or journey.
